# pdf codes


## quant folder 

```{python}
# Convert to PDF, simple as pdf keeps tag
import subprocess

# Render to PDF using Quarto
subprocess.run(['quarto', 'render', 'a_rates_returns.qmd', '--to', 'pdf'])

print("PDF document 'a_rates_returns.pdf' created.")
```

# older code 


```{python}
#| eval: false
# Convert to PDF, simple as pdf keeps tag
import subprocess

output_path = "output"  # Changed from "output/quant" to just "output"
file_path = "quant/a_rates_returns.qmd"

# Render to PDF using Quarto
subprocess.run([
    'quarto', 'render', file_path, 
    '--to', 'pdf',
    '--output-dir', output_path
])

print(f"PDF created at output/quant/a_rates_returns.pdf")
```
